title: How to Filter Your Bookmarks on Yelp

steps.headline: Visit the Yelp website.
steps.description: Once the page displays, there are many areas of the page, as well as several text fields to find your item.

steps.headline: Login to your Yelp page, with your Yelp credentials.
Locate the About Me tab near the top of the page.
Click the "Bookmarks" sub-tab.
steps.description: After clicking, shortly thereafter, you'll see the page you'll need.

steps.headline: Locate the area of the page labeled either "Filter by Label" or "Filter by Category" or "Filter by City".
steps.description: These will be located directly underneath the sub-tabs on the Yelp bookmarks page.

steps.headline: Locate each of the label options your bookmarks have been filed under, or the categories you're bookmarks have originally been placed in (top-level category) or major city the business is in/near.
steps.description: These will be located under the filter areas of the page.

steps.headline: Click the appropriate choice.
steps.description:
If the business filter option isn't located on the page, you'll need to click the "More" option under either the "Filter by Category" or "Filter by City". {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/b\/b4\/Filter-Your-Bookmarks-on-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/b\/b4\/Filter-Your-Bookmarks-on-Yelp-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

steps.headline: Click the appropriate choice from the sub-tab, if you needed to click "More" to list the appropriate choice.

"} Click the "Bookmarks" sub-tab. After clicking, shortly thereafter, you'll see the page you'll need. Locate the area of the page labeled either "Filter by Label" or "Filter by Category" or "Filter by City". These will be located directly underneath the sub-tabs on the Yelp bookmarks page. Locate each of the label options your bookmarks have been filed under, or the categories you're bookmarks have originally been placed in (top-level category) or major city the business is in/near. These will be located under the filter areas of the page. Click the appropriate choice. Once the page displays, there are many areas of the page, as well as several text fields to find your item.

{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/21\/Sort-Your-Bookmarks-Differently-on-Yelp-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/2\/21\/Sort-Your-Bookmarks-Differently-on-Yelp-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570,"licensing":"

\n<\/p><\/div>"} Click the "Bookmarks" sub-tab.
After clicking, shortly thereafter, you'll see the page you'll need.
Locate the area of the page labeled either "Filter by Label" or "Filter by Category" or "Filter by City".
These will be located directly underneath the sub-tabs on the Yelp bookmarks page.
Locate each of the label options your bookmarks have been filed under, or the categories you're bookmarks have originally been placed in (top-level category) or major city the business is in/near.
These will be located under the filter areas of the page.
If the business filter option isn't located on the page, you'll need to click the "More" option under either the "Filter by Category" or "Filter by City".
